sys_ui_macro.name: AssistUIMacro
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <g2:evaluate var='sys_id'> var val = current.getValue('sys_id'); val; </g2:evaluate> <iframe src="x_manen_assist_AssistIFrame.do?sysparm_id=$[sys_id]&src=section&sysparm_nostack=true" id="assist-iframe-call" width="100%" height="100%" style="border:0px;height:150px;margin:20px 0 0;"></iframe>
</j:jelly>
